name: Energy Hunter
description: Press play to start the game an use the up, down, left and right arrows to control the pink players movement.  To gain energy, move around and collect the black, circular energy icons.  If you collect a heart you will gain one life, this will increase your chances of not getting out when you hit an obstacle.  If you hit the black obstacle, that has flashing colours on it, you will lose a life, also if you run into another obstacle, that is moving either up and down or left and right, you will also lose a life.  If you collect a broom, this will remove all the obstacles left on your screen, if you collect a black icon with a S on it, you will automatically get a shield around you, this means that if you run into an obstacle you won't loose a life.  If you collect a yellow coin, this will give you 100 points.  if you loose all your lives, it's game over, but the game will go back to the home screen and give you the chance to either, play again or quit the game.
